desc: 100% Atk, Def, Rec when BB gauge is above 50%, 100% spark damage reduction, 150% spark damage, spark damage fills BB gauge  & 20% damage reduction for 2 turns when sparks dealt is over 15 times
lore:
A black Break Action Revolver that is Knives' weapon of choice. The twin of the Silver AGL .45, albeit of a different color.

It has a high destructive power. It remained in the possession of Vash until Knives finally took it back to fulfill his quest to erase humanity from Gunsmoke. Similar to its twin, this gun can also transform into an Angel Arm.
name: Dark AGL .45 Colt
